111.content:
It was a lovely spring day, not too warm and not too cold and on days like today, it was hard for you to want to stay inside. Unfortunately for you, being a young, twenty-something procrastinator, you had work to do for that one class you always seemed to just manage to forget about and put off doing homework for.

         Sighing to yourself after looking out the window for the fifth time that day, you turned back to the open word document, the cursor blinking, poised and ready for this project to get underway. The dorm room you live in seems more like a prison of sorts, four white walls, sparsely decorated, a bed and a desk for writing. Of course, unlike a prison, you are free to come and go as you please, but you knew that work had to get done soon to save you from the doomed path of failure. You contemplate the idea of being rescued from this boring scene.

         Your eyes drift to the poster hanging just to your left. An action shot of one of your video gaming idols, The Blue blur himself, Sonic the Hedgehog. You sigh with a smile as you imagine your hero coming to whisk you away from this place to take you on a fantastic adventure. Where would you go? What would you do? Your mind wandered with possibility as your eyes continued to drift over the poster, from his brilliantly green eyes, to his casually cocky smirk, and eventually working their way down to his sneaker clad feet. You chuckle to yourself, thinking back on "those" websites that you frequented, searching for art or stories about your hero and the devious positions that he would find himself in, mostly focusing on what was hidden inside of those famous red and white shoes.

         Eventually you snap yourself out of the daydream that you are having and return your attention to the still-blank word document on your computer screen. Frowning, you begin to do diligently research the topic that you would be presenting and get into a groove. The work begins to almost pour out of you, the thoughts of Sonic are now only in the back of your mind as you focus on your research.

         You keep at this pace for a good click, losing track of time. The click-clack of the keys keeps up at a soothing, rhythmic pace. You come to the end of the final paragraph of the paper and smile to yourself, proud of the work you have accomplished. You begin to prep for the next phase of your assignment and begin to re-read your work. You eventually get to the last paragraph and your heart skips several beats. The words "The one, The only." repeat themselves for entire sentences. You blink and rub your eyes, surely they must be playing tricks on you. When you open them, you notice the paragraph begins to delete itself and types itself out in a blue font.

"It's time to play with the one and only."


         Panicking, you begin to try to delete it, but you feel your eyes grow heavy as a warm sensation washes over you. Your body begins to relax and you drift off to sleep.

         Hours later, you open your eyes and hear a familiar voice say, Hey kid. Looking around you see....

Maybe you were too quick to judge the giant based on the first encounter. “But then again I’d much rather keep you around as a tiny plaything.” And just like that your heart sank. The towering red and white boot of the massive pink creature skimmed it's way along the rather thick strands of carpet in your direction. It's tall, imposing image giving you chills as it finally started to sink in just how helpless and tiny you were in this world. The movement seemed to take ages from your perspective but in actuality it was probably a few seconds. The Boot cast a massive shadow as big as a swimming pool wherever it hovered like a shroud of evil creeping it's way across the pink lands of this bedroom...Evil?...No surely that couldn't be right. This whole ordeal was getting to you. You needed to get a hold of yourself if you were to survive like this. You quickly weighed your options as once more time seemed to slow for everything around you. As you scrambled to your feet, you noticed a hard, cold feeling on your wrist. You were quickly drawn to it and saw a watch wrapped around it...a very strange looking watch. It didn't have a clock face at all. Just a blank screen with a circle in the middle. What was this? But you didn't have time to contemplate that mystery however as the boot of the ginormous pink creature thundered to the ground, causing the ground beneath you to tremour a bit. You had difficulty keeping balance but you managed to stay upright long enough for you to realise that the boot had landed just a few feet away from you. Thank heaven for small mercies I suppose.

But then you realised something. The lip of her boot was pretty much level with your chest. You could easily climb up onto it and grab onto the fabric of her boot while it carried you around the house. But what if you fell off while it was moving and fell to your untimely demise? Could you even survive a fall like that? But you realise that there weren't many options for you to take at this size. Climbing a table leg was an impossibility and trying to get the attention of the pink creature was a nearly hopeless task. You figured that you might as well screw the odds and do something daring for once. You run up to the boot with great haste and quickly force yourself up ontop of it and quickly gripping it tight just moments before it lifted up off the ground again. A very forceful rush of air as the boot moved through the bedroom threatened to knock you off. As you looked down, you felt a bit dizzy from being so high up off the ground. The feeling soon came to pass however as the foot shortly began to descend once more towards the pink carpet. You braced for the impact and shut your eyes. You were rocked about like a ship in a storm out at sea. By all means you should have been knocked off...yet somehow you kept your grip. Again more questions entered your mind. But it looked like this giant was about to lift her foot again. Would you be able to hold on for this time? What should you do?

After all, what could a watch do that would make this situation any worse than it already was? But...what if the watch was a weapon of some kind. What if the button did something that would get you killed in a rather stupid way? All these questions and more kept running around in your head as the watch just lay there on your arm, silent, unchanging and unmoving. After a few seconds more of indecision you just decided to go with whatever was in your gut. Standing around listening to voices in your head all day wasn't a healthy thing to do. No the only way you would get results would be if you did something about this predicament. You breathed in deeply, and then...
121232.title: Hold on and maybe see what the watch can do.

1212322.content:
You decided to f the consequences an press the circle on your watch. Your finger fit perfectly inside the outline of the circle, almost as if it had been made for you. The screen suddenly began to pulse a faded white outward from the circle, but no sound could be heard to indicate any changes to it. You almost immediately began to feel dizzy and your vision started to blur. The world around seemed to be repeating in on itself and swinging like a pendulum through your eyes. You almost lost your grip on the fabric from the overwhelming assault of your senses...or rather lack thereof at this moment in time. Despite your vision being partially obstructed however, you could clearly see that your surroundings were moving but not how you would expect. They weren't moving sideways, they were moving up. "Perhaps this thing finally put it's foot down?" you wondered. But then as you turned to your left, you noticed that there was a lot more room to stand than there was before. You could not even feel your hands gripping the fibres of the boot anymore. You weren't one to question good fortune so you laid your back down on the lip and tried to regain your strength. After a few seconds your vision slowly returned to you and the situation became clear. The lip was definitely a lot bigger than it was before. And the fibres of the boot were now just a few centimetres thicker than your arm. You had shrunk!

You quickly leapt back to your feet and frantically scanned your environment to confirm your suspicions. They had not been presumptuous in the slightest. What could previously have barely qualified as a ledge was now practically a balcony. This was all too incredible. How could this be? You suddenly remembered the watch on your wrist. You quickly whipped it around to find that the circle was still there, but the outline was fainter than it had been previously. Could this watch be the cause of his shrinking? "But...how?...A watch can't change size...unless..." You quickly began feeling along the back of your arm. You felt something running down it through your sleeve. Something long, stiff and rubbery. A tube of some kind. But connected to what? You felt around some more behind your back for any clue as to what the tube was connecting you to. This search proved fruitless as your back was completely clear of any abnormal extremities besides some more tubes that stretched downwards. Had you been augmented somehow? Were you the result of some kind of experiment involving shrinking? Is that why you couldn't remember? You shook your head firmly. You had no time to wonder about questions like this now. You needed a plan and fast. You looked around the blank space on the watch for any other symbols. Your search again found nothing. "Perhaps it's just really hard to see?" You pressed the area of screen outside the circle and the same pulsing white light appeared, but this time inside the circle. You felt your senses leaving this earth once more and your vision began to distort and spin. Your energy drained out of your body and you fell to the ground, breathing heavily and in a pained manner. You struggled to keep your eyes open but your vision was too distorted and colourful to comprehend now. You just had to wait until this was all over. All other thoughts became a blur along with your vision as you awaited whatever fate had in store for you.

12123221.content:
A few more agonisingly long seconds of dizziness and blurred vision pass by you until you finally regain your senses. As your sight comes back to you, your vision is filled by the fabric of the creature's boot once more. Only this time It's smaller. You place your hand against the firm fabric of the boot and feel it's roughness. The strands of fabric are slightly smaller than your finger now. You grew! So you device can not only shrink you but grow you too. This is an amazing discovery. It means you can get back to normal size and find out what the hell is going on...but wait...if you're bigger than the last time...and the lip was little more than a ledge before-A sudden rocking causes you to lose your balance against the giant boot and you stumbled backwards off the lip. You reached forward as you tipped back, your hands reaching out to the lip hoping beyond hope to catch it. You only just managed to get a grip on the lip before you fell down to oblivion. Your heart rate sped up rapidly as the gravity of the situation was now leering's head at you. You were now dangling dozens of feet off the ground from a small piece of plastic on a boot bigger than your whole family if they were your size. If this was the normal size for humans here. You started to shiver slightly at the prospect of losing grip altogether. A small bead of sweat ran down your neck from your forehead. You tried to keep your erratic breathing under control. You tried to think of a way out of this...Then you felt your grip slipping.

You let out a small yell as you felt your fate slipping ever closer from your hands. "No...NO...HELP!" You tried to call out to anyone who could hear you. But the girl above made no movement, no action, she just stood completely unaware of your existence. With every Centimetre of plastic you slid off, you could practically feel your life falling away from you. Your favourite TV shows. Your story. Your memories. Your friends. Everything that was you...gone in an instant. You felt tears begin to form in your eyes. Soon only your finger tips clung on for dear life. Slip went one. Slip went another, until finally...Slip...you couldn't hold on any longer...You lost your grip altogether. You watched as the monolithic boot attached to a sky reaching leg that seemingly had no end fell away from you. Everything slowed down in that instant. You thought of home. You thought of friends. You thought of family. You thought of school. You thought of your regrets. You shut your eyes and waited for the end.

You felt a sharp pain in your back. This soon went away. You wondered if you were dead. Cautiously you opened your eyes. They were filled with a blinding white light from up above. You tried to shield it with your hands and then you realised things felt a lot heavier than normal. You turned your head to the right...and saw a flat pink ground before you. "......what?". You quickly looked around. The whole ground was pink. And that light was coming a ceiling lamp above the room. You wheezed with relief. You weren't dead...yet. You quickly caught sight of the massive looming darkness of the boot you had previously put your rock climbing skills to use on overhead. it wasn't that far above you. Then you looked towards where the leg was coming from. It was coming from the bed. This giant was sitting on it, waving her feet around absent mindedly above you. That must be why her boot was stopped in mid air. It also explained why you survived the fall. You weren't high enough off the ground to be crunched. You quickly climbed to your feet and another shiver ran down your body as you realised how lucky you had been. Now came the matter of deciding what to do next. You looked at your watch again. This time instead of just a circle, it had a red bar flashing at the top of the screen. "Low on battery power" you summarised. But surely every power socket was far too big for you to use now. You weren't even sure if this thing worked with a plug. What could you do?

It was an odd experience to wander about in a jungle when you're between two and six inches tall. You had no idea how you got there, but you weren't going to stick around to find out.

You sighed, "Finally, relief..."

So you headed to the hut and laid against the wall near one of the doors, passing out from exhaustion.

===
Some time later, Amy came home carrying groceries and humming a song.

She paused when she saw a doll by her front door. "Huh? Did Sonic give me a present for Valentine's day? It's three months too early, but it's the thought counts!"

She put down her bags and reached for you, she paused when you moaned and slid a little bit.

"Huh... I don't think dolls normally do that... unless it's an expensive one!" Amy said before she let out a loud happy squeal, waking you up.

"Wha... What happened?" You uttered as you wiped your eyes.

Amy blinked before she asked, "Are you a expensive doll given to me from Sonic?"

"No," You answered as you stood up.

She then asked, "Are you a robot created by Eggman?"

"No! I'm a human! My name is Y/N. I don't know how I got here or why I'm so small. I was looking for someone to help me," You answered.

Amy stared at you for a few moments before she said," Well, You did introduce yourself, so I guess I should. I'm Amy Rose and I..."

12131.content:
I'm Amy Rose and I am willing to help you," Amy said in her cheerful tone.

"Thanks!" you said.

"Can you wait out here for a moment, while I put my groceries inside?" Amy asked.

"Sure, I can wait," You answered.

So Amy picked up her grocery bags and took them inside. After she placed them on a counter, She came back outside, bent down besides you, and put out her hand for you to step onto. After climbing onto hand, she stood up and said, "Until you get back to normal size, I guess we're roommates... Yay!"

"Once again, thanks," You replied, getting a confirmatory nod from the pink Hedgehog.

So she headed over to... well, the living room spot and put you on the coffee table, right next to a bowl of fruit. She said, "I'll be putting away my groceries and getting something for you to stay in. Don't wander too far!"

After she walked to the kitchen area, You looked at the fruit bowl and pulled off a single grape. You did your best to eat it as cleanly as possible, but you did get quite a bit of juice on your face and hands.

Eventually, Amy returned to the coffee table, carrying a hamster cage, a doll house, and an empty shoe box.

"Alright, I have three 'houses' for you to live in for the moment. After we get you set up, I'll take you to Tails and see if he can find out a way to either restore your size or send you home," Amy said as she put the three things down on the floor.. She noticed your messy state and took out a handkerchief. She handed it to you and said, "Oh! here. You're kinda... messy."

"Thanks... I get the feeling that's mostly all I said to you," You muttered as you cleaned your face and hands. "So what are my choices."

"Alright, I have a hamster cage, never used, but I always wanted a pet, but sometimes my adventures take a few days. There's my old Doll house. I might need to sew some soft mattresses and bean bag chairs for you to use. Not unless you don't mind sleeping on hard plastic," Amy said as she brought out the two items onto the table. She brought up the shoe box and said, "And finally, I have a shoe box, one that I can use some glue, Popsicle sticks, and more shoe boxes to make a multi-level house for you!"

You looked them over and made a decision.

Keep being good and you’ll have nothing to worry about.” You sighed in defeat as she dropped you into the cage and locked it shut.

You sat down on a spool that Amy provided as a chair, while she washed your clothes. You were expecting her to chat about anything really. You would have bet on her asking if you'd join some community theater or something.

When she said nothing and merely stared at you with a a guilty look on her face. Eventually, she slowed down on washing your clothes and hung them up on some tower holders. All while still staring at you.

She blinked for a few moments before answered, "Oh, sorry. I just... Look, you being so small is kinda... cute. I also was thinking about what if we were to date... And I feel really bad for thinking you were a spy."

122.content:
It’s been about a week since you found yourself in this house. Everything about the house was gargantuan; the walls, the furniture, most importantly the inhabitants. There were only two, a mature looking anthropomorphic rabbit woman, and her young daughter. The daughter also had a pet of some sort, but you haven’t seen him in a while. You doubted it was dead since the girl wasn’t mourning when it vanished, but you didn’t really care enough to figure out the real reason. You kept yourself hidden as you would spy on the two, trying to learn about them and their habits to aid in your own survival. The mother seemed polite and proper most of the time, a trait which rubbed off on her daughter, though she still had some childish traits which come with her age. You actually considered revealing yourself to one of them, seeing if thy could help you, but the fear of being mistaken for a rodent or some other pest kept that idea at bay. Unfortunately, the rabbits were very clean which made it hard to get food most of the time. The daughter would sometimes have an accident, but you you would still need to act fast to get it.

Today was not a lucky day. You haven’t eaten in a while and we’re starting to get desperate. You happened upon a mouse trap with food over the trigger as bait, staring hard at the trap pondering the risk and reward while your stomach growled. With little choice, you leaned forward and carefully tried to remove the food without setting off the trap. So far so good, but you soon lost your balance and fell forward, setting off the trap and feeling a large metal bar slam against your back painfully, holding you tightly in place. You tried to squirm free, but it was no use.you could only weakly call for help and hope whichever giant found you would be benevolent.

Footsteps soon echoed as someone entered the room to investigate. The footsteps, while huge seemed a bit lighter than the larger being’s. The daughter must have found you. You though you heard her mom call her ‘Cream.’ As her gloves hand lifted you up at dizzying speeds, you shuddered at the many possibilities that awaited you, quietly praying for the best as she removed the bar and inspected you closer.
122.title: Cream the Rabbit

"Oh my..." The gigantic rabbit girl named after a dairy product gasped in a mix of shock and concern. Her eyes shined down at you with warm and kind type of glow that seem to ease your tensions away."Are..are you okay, mister." she spoke up once more in a worried voice.

"Yes I'm quite fine...miss" You quietly reassure the massive bunny. She affectionately rub your head, which you silently found kind of funny in a strange sense.

"Wait here.." She kindly said to you as she placed you back down on the ground. The gigantic rabbit girl appeared to be in deep thought while she absentmindedly took off her shoes and tossed them aside without looking. You could only marvel at just how small you were to your new friend as the shoe flew past your head missing you by inches and landing with a fairly loud thud. Cream was unaware of the danger she almost put you through as she tossed the other one to the side without looking and continued to think about whatever. You smelt a weird and strong aroma which seemed to be a mixture of flowers and sour cheddar. Your blush grew as you saw her young humanish four toed feet. Because she's rabbit, her feet were pretty wide and big, even by the standards of her size.

As you looked back up, you immediately heated up and felt like you were about to spontaneously combust once you saw her frilly panties. As luck would have it, Cream finally looked back down at you at this moment. You tried to regain yourself as she looked at you with blank, yet questioning look.

"What's wrong mister.." Cream softly muttered to you. "Nothing.. sweetie." You said as a sense of regret, shame, and guilt grows in your heart. Cream gives you an more intrigued and curious look.

What does she do?

12211.content:
After a brief moment of thought the young rabbit shrugged and picked you up again. She then walked over to a table in the middle of the room and let you down on its wooden surface and said; ' wait here mister, I'll be back soon ', before leaving the room. A few seconds later you heard her voice call out for her mother. The idea of another giant seeing you and possibly mistaking you for a bug or another pest started to creep its way into your thoughts, which left you a bit on edge. But you soon figured that you'd probably be safer with an adult than a kid in this situation. And thanks to your previous observations, you knew that she was gentle and even kinder than her daughter. So for now that reasoning kept your anxiety at bay.

         Soon Cream returned with her mother, finishing her explanation as they entered. Once her mother appeared to get the gist of it, her gaze shifted towards you. At first she appeared a bit skeptical, but then surprised once she realized the situation. She blinked twice in disbelief, before getting closer to confirm her abrupt presumption. And sure enough, her daughter did find a small human.

         She started to hastily look you up and down, instinctively searching for any wounds or other threats to your well being. She immediately noticed how skinny you were and all the cuts and bruises you had, alongside all the dirt covering your frail body. This examination continued for about a minute or two before she darted across the room to a counter and started pulling various items out of the its cabinets. Meanwhile Cream walked back up to you wearing a timid, but curious expression. Although you heard lots of noises coming from where the older rabbit went, Cream's unnerving gaze demanded your attention. Though she appeared then proved to be nice earlier, your previous experiences with kids have shown they can be very... unpredictable. So you decided not to take your eyes off her, just in case her demeanor was misleading. But she only stared at you, not moving a muscle. You could only imagine what she was thinking, just like before paranoia presented itself to you, her stillness wasn't really reassuring.

         Before long her mother came back, and began to to clean off the dirt surrounding your cuts with a wet tissue. She then quickly but carefully took a drop of some kind of transparent liquid and gently pressed it on your multiple but minor gashes, of course it stung a little bit, but at least you were clean for now. She also brought along some cloth and cut up pieces of food to aid your situation. 1223141112122.content:
As the gigantic cream colored rabbit girl came back into the room, she flipped on the light, blinding you briefly before your eyes could readjust. Cream walked over to the tiny crib to watch her new 'baby brother' wake up with blissful smile on her face. You were still right where she left you, though not through lack of trying to escape. You tried to make your move five minutes after she left you alone, but Cream certainly wasn't stupid. She figured you'd probably try to get away so she took 2 precautions to make sure you stayed put. First, when she tucked you in, she wrapped one of the tiny blankets around you to restrain your arms and legs and tucked you into the main blanket nice and tightly so you were pretty much immobilized. And even if you did somehow manage to get out of that, she had the crib on top of a table which offered you absolutely no safe way down without any help from her. You struggled for maybe 10 minutes before giving up. Cream had won. You were stuck here. Mixtures of anger, depression, and humiliation swirled around inside you. But for now, you did the only thing you could do: take a nap and wait for your Mo- for Cream to come back. You felt even more embarrassed that you almost made that slip. Still... you suppose it could be worse... somehow.

You were awakened by Cream's chipper voice and blinded by the lights suddenly coming on, but as your vision cleared, you saw the gigantic rabbit girl smiling down at you. It seemed almost loving, though you did note the familiar look of mischief in there as well. "Aww, you stayed put. That's a good little baby. I would have had to punish you if you didn't and we both know you don't want that. Cream said as she gently removes the blankets that had held you in place until now. "I got something EXTRA special for the good little baby boy." Cream said cheerfully as she produced a jar of baby food from her pocket. "Oh no. There is no way in hell that I'm eatin-" you were cut off as Cream's gloved finger shoved a mouthful of the gooey slop into your mouth while it was open to complain. In all honesty, it didn't taste too bad, but the sheer humiliation that she was putting you through by forcing feeding you baby food was too much. There's no way she didn't know what she was putting you through. But then again you were basically a toy to her. Something to amuse her in whatever way she sees fit. "Now eat up so that baby can grow up to be all big and strong like me." Cream says in her chipper tone as the finger pulls away to grab another scoop of food. "What the hell is wrong with you? I'm not a damn baby! And I'm not going to eat any more of that!" you shouted up to her, shutting your mouth just in time to avoid another mouthful and causing her finger to accidentally smear the baby food all over your face. Cream looked down at you sternly.

122314111231.content:
"Oh I know!" Cream shouted excitedly. "I should paint your nails! I'll bet you'll look sooooooo pretty afterwards!" Obviously you were much less thrilled with this idea. You were about to voice your opposition to her plan, but you eyes quickly shifted to one of her feet tapping. Moving up and down against the ground providing a fun reminder of her grim warning from before. Though Cream wasn't doing this intentionally, it still reminded you of the position you were in. Taking a deep breath, you swallowed your pride and nodded. "O-okay, lets just get this over with." you said reluctantly causing Cream to hop up and down clapping excitedly. The tiny hops created mini tremors for you which caused you to fall on your ass, but you knew this was nothing compared to the humiliation that the massive rabbit girl was about to subject you to. You began to pander if letting her step on you would be the preferable option.

Cream quickly ran off to the bathroom without a word and soon returned holding a whole set of various nail polishes. Setting down the rainbow of colors before you she excitedly read off all the names of each color trying to see if you had a preference for any. Of course your preferred choice was to have none at all, but that certainly wasn't an option for you. After remaining silent towards every single option, Cream grinned and picked up a royal purple colored bottle containing similarly colored polish inside. Carefully removing the brush, the gigantic rabbit got a large glob onto the brush. To someone like her, it would perhaps be considered a reasonable amount, but to you it was enough to cake your entire body in colored polish. "Now hold still while I do this." she commanded as she positioned the brush. You did as you were told, mostly out of fear. "Please be easy to remove." you whispered to yourself as the brush came closer. Of course, given your size, Cream had a lot of trouble being precise with the brush. Soon your entire hand was covered in a messy layer of purple. You groaned inwardly to yourself as Cream giggled at her mess. "Okay, not take off your shoes so that I can get your toes." Again you did as she ordered, getting some of the polish on the nice dress shoes Cream forced you into. Not that you cared. This was probably the closest to an act of defiance you could get away with so you might as well savor the thought. Cream was much more careful with the toes, having practice earlier, though she still ended up making a bit of a mess on both feet. By the time she had finished your entire hands and half of your foot was covered in a messy layer of purple. Cream put the supplies back and admired her work. "You're even cuter than I imagined." she giggled, poking you with a finger and pinching your cheeks. You were humiliated. Your sole comfort in all of this was that she was the only person who could see you like this. Hopefully it stayed that way.

1231.content:
You woke up, a bit surprised when you weren't in your bed.

Instead, you were on what felt like a fluffy rug. A giant fluffy rug.

As you sat up and rubbed your eyes, you muttered, "What did I do last night? I could've sworn I didn't drink. All I did was play video games."

After removing your hands from eyes, you looked around.

You realized that either you were either tiny, or you were in a giant's room.

The walls had several shelves, each holding either gems on pillows or small statues that held gems. There was a computer with an Egg chair, a flatscreen TV with some bean bag chairs around it, and a large bed. There was also some dressers, one of which was beside a door. There was also a table with various cleaning supplies on it.

There was an open closet, filled with various clothes. Some of which was a black bodysuit with a heart-shaped breastplate, with white boots that also had a heart on them. There were others, but most were a variation on the Black bodysuit with a heart on it.

"No way..." You uttered as you stood up and began to walk around.

As you neared one dresser, you heard the door unlock. From under the dresser, you watched Rouge the Bat walk in as she carried a bag.

"That was nearly a bust. Barely got a few unpolished gems from the transport, but this baby made it worth it," Rouge said as she picked out a large gem from the bag. It was almost as large as her head and was kinda egg-shaped. She sat down at the cleaning table and put the large Gem on the table. "Mama's gonna give you a good name. If you're rainbow-colored, maybe Rainbow Egg? ...Nah, Eggman might want to steal you then."

You thought about what to do.
1231.title: Appearance in Rouge's room

12312.content:
Stepping out from behind one of the legs of the dresser, you said as loud as you could, You began. "Ms. Rouge? I apologize for suddenly appearing in your home and in a tiny form, but I have-"

"No idea how you got here or why you're tiny? Good question that do deserve an answer," Rouge said, facing away from you as she began to clean up the large egg-shaped gem. "But nothing valuable is free."

"Wait... What are you talking about?" You asked, wondering if you made a mistake.

"My services tend to be quite expensive and I doubt you have anything valuable on your person to get me to help you in any way, short stuff. But do tell me your name," Rouge said, still cleaning the gem.

"My name is... (NAME)," You answered.

"Well, (NAME), I guess I can tell you that I might need a partner for a few missions. I need to get something called Chaos emeralds, but they've all been put under heavy guard and little old me is having a bit of trouble getting inside. If you help me, I'll look into getting you back to normal and back home," Rouge explained as she stopped to look at you. She had a slight smile on her face. "That is, unless you find working with me too good to stop."

"If you're having trouble, then what makes you think I'll be able to help?" You asked.

"I've been at the gem collecting game for so long, that I've become a bit predictable. But I doubt anyone ever predicted someone the size of a doll entering and taking the gems. I'll have to get you some gear, but that'll be easy," Rouge said as she stood up and began to saunter towards you. "So... are you in or will I have to drop you somewhere to find your own way to get bigger?"

"What makes you think you might have a way to get me big again?" You asked as Rouge stopped near you and bent down, almost sitting on the ground. You did your best to avoid looking at her bosom.

"That's a secret. One you'd have to earn," Rouge cooed as she reached for you and... rubbed a finger against your cheek.

"Are... are you responsible?" you asked, too afraid to move.

"Same answer. You gotta earn the answer before I can tell you," Rouge replied. The smile was now more a smirk.

You sighed before you gave your answer to Rouge's offer. You...
12312.title: Rouge knew you were there?

choices: Rouge likes you better as her pet
123122.content:
Hundreds of questions bombarded your mind, and what little information you managed to get out of Rouge only manage to raise even more question. Was this all some accident? Did she happen to find you? Was she the reason you ended up shrunken and in her room? Was she actually willing to unshrink you after you got the emerald for her? None of them seemed to have a clear answer to you. But one thing seemed pretty clear, this gigantic bat woman did not seem trustworthy in the slightest. Her casual attitude towards your situation. How playful she is as she withholds pretty much every scrap of information. He’ll you had some serious doubts that she really had a way to fix you. She was likely holding your obvious hopes over your head to make you more compliant.

“No.” You said in a serious manner. Rouge seemed to be caught off guard by your answer. She was certain that you would agree to help her in return for her aid. “No? Are you saying you don’t want to find out how to get back to your old height?” She asked, keeping that playful hint in her voice while she leaned in closer to you. Seeing the bat woman even closer was pretty scary, but you had to hold your ground. You couldn’t show weakness now if you wanted her to take you seriously. “I’m saying you’re giving me no reason to actually trust you. For all I know you’re just lying to me to trick me into helping you.”
You felt satisfied with how you handled yourself there. Unfortunately Rogue was less impressed with the show of defiance. With a disappointed sigh she stood back up to her full height, putting the jewel she was cleaning in a glass display before looking back down at you. Her towering figure mixed with the disappointed look made you second guess your decision to refuse. Not that it mattered now as her gloves hand snatched you up with lightning fast quickness. She certainly seems like a master thief. Problem is she gigantic, annoyed and holding you like a toy in her palm. You shivered slightly despite your attempts to keep your cool. This was enough for the bat to realized her attempt to intimidate you was working. A smirk started to form as the hand started to tilt. You tried to grab onto the finger but her action was too fast. You plummeted to the ground before landing roughly on a metal floor not to far away. Thankfully the drop wasn’t too bad on your body, but looking back up, you realized that Rouge has deposited you inside an empty hamster cage. Now grinning at her captive from above, Rouge closed and locked the only exit, which was on the ceiling.

“If you don’t wish to help me then so be it. Since I’m so nice I’ll let you stay with me. Rent free even. Aren’t I a generous gal?” She laughed as she made a kissing motion and walked away.

You say there in regret. Even if you didn’t trust her, you should have at least went along at first. You probably would have had an opportunity to get some actual help. Now your trapped. A prisoner in her living room with no one to help. No one who would even know about your existence.

About an hour later Rogue returned to check up on her new pet.

Rouge strutted into the room, and you took her in...her towering figure, and the room shook with each step she took towards you. You gulp a bit as she smirks and you look up at her looming face staring in at you.

"Hello there little guy, i'm back." She said with a smirk and you took this opportunity to try to fix things.

"L-listen ms. Rouge, i've had time to think it over, and i'd like to uh...help you in return for your help..." You said and she leaned her face close to the cage...her eyes carrying a glint of mischief as her pink lips opened to speak the words you dreaded most.

"Deal's expired hon, you're my pet now...and you'll be staying that way for the rest of your life...or for however long it takes for me to get bored of you." She said, the words beating you down.

"P-please, I don't wanna be this small, or your pet, or-" You were cut off as with a clang, the door to the cage above you opened up and a gloved hand reached in, curling around you as you were lifted up to her face, with a gleeful smirk.

"Hush now, you're gonna learn obedience with your new owner, got it?" She said, and you gulped, being quiet. She smirked at this.

As she tousled your hair, Rouge said, "You're gonna pamper me because I've had a long day. What with the robots, security systems, guards... All of which have been getting smarter."

So she walked over to a beanbag chair and laid down on it. She looked at you and said, "Take off your shoes."

Not wanting to upset her, you did as ordered. She smiled and nodded before placing you on her back and tossing your shoes in a garbage bin.

"You won't need those ever again. Just hop up and down on my back and rub my wings," Rouge ordered. "hurt me and I'll punish you."

"And if I do well?" You asked as you began to stomp on her back.

"Mnnnn... Keep that up and the reward will be good for my little pet..." Rouge moaned.

"Like... a better cage" you asked as you continued to stomp on Rouge's back. You wanted to ask for either freedom or growing bigger, but you guessed it would only get her to laugh at you.

"...Mnnn mmmmaybe... " Rouge uttered, briefly kicking her legs in the air. "I might actually grant that request..."

After stomping around her back, you walked over to her wings and began to gently rub her wings, fearful you might hurt her and attack you.

As you rubbed her wings, they twitched... a lot. A few times, you swore the was trying to knock you off her back.

Eventually, she said, "Ah, thanks for the massage. You don't know how hard it is to find a good wing massager when you look as good as I do. Damn fools keep eyeballing my hot body. Not like you, though."

'Yeah. I do that and you'd punish me by either flicking me or giving me a too-up-close look at your body,' You thought. You asked, "So what next?"

Rouge answered...

"My feet need a massage," said Rouge. You could do more than that, you thought. Rouge slowly takes off her boots and sets them down. You can smell them already. Two giant sweaty feet sitting right in front of you. They look exactly like a human woman's feet would. Her toes were painted with a hot pink. You slowly approach Rouge's feet and place your hand on her heel. You rub upwards towards the sole and keep going to the ball of the foot.

And the best part was you still had a whole other foot left.

"Now then, you're gonna help me relieve some 'girl stress', got it?" Rouge asked with a smirk.

"...You're going to make me get you off, aren't you?" You asked, blushing a little.

"Got it in one, but do a good job, and I'll make sure your time as my pet will be very rewarding," Rouge answered as she put you on a table. "Now watch..."

She turned away and walked a few steps away.

Then she began to make a show of stripping. she took off her heart breastplate and tossed it onto a couch. After sitting on an otttoman, she slid off her thigh-high boots.

As she then stood up, she said, "If you're a bad boytoy, then I'll make you clean my boots right after a very physical mission."

Still facing away from you, she made sure to wiggle her hips as she stripped off her bodysuit. You weren't sure if you were surprised or not by the fact she didn't wear any underwear.

12332.content:
Being a spy for G.U.N. you've had your run-ins with terrorists, foreign threats, and other secret services before; and today wasn't anything special. Just another prevent *blank* from *blank* to preserve national security case. You didn't necessarily find this job boring or annoying, it's just that you've done this so many times before it just wasn't as interesting as it used to be. To sum up the briefing, you basically needed to steal or destroy some kind of device an opposing country had created along with any data and witnesses. You were of course also given your equipment with refinements and upgrades hear and there, not that it really mattered considering you probably wouldn't even use half of it. After a reminder of how important the mission was and the consequences of failure, you were given the location and were hurriedly escorted to your target.

         Nothing worth noting really happened until you approached the building you were to infiltrate. Oddly enough, there were no guards on patrol, no lights or fences, and no defensive precautions at all. It almost looked abandoned, if not for how sleek and clean the area itself was. Out of suspicion you went back over your data, and sure enough, this was the right place. You carefully entered the building, cautiously scanning each hallway for anything that could trip an alarm or alert the guards. Yet again there was nothing but the dark, virtually nothing threatening to you or your mission. But you still stayed vigilant, you didn't need your training or years of experience to know this could be a trap. Soon you neared your objective, the device was on the other side of a rather normal looking doorway. You quickly checked your sidearm to make sure it wasn't jammed and slowly opened the door.

         You aligned the barrel with your line of sight and searched the room for any hostiles, but once again there was only black. Still keeping your weapon ready in one hand you entered, and you almost immediately spotted the device. It was somewhat small and looked like some kind of firearm, but not like any gun you've seen before, most of its features looked alien. Suddenly the door behind you slammed shut, and you were ambushed by multiple men. It was too dark to make out any of them clearly, let alone tell how many there were.

         Though they appeared overwhelming, you've come to far to simply let them stop you; even if they did, you weren't going down without taking a few of them with you. You responded to their abrupt attack by pulling the trigger of your pistol. With two clean shots two of the silhouettes fell, before another kicked your weapon out of your grasp. In return you swiftly pulled out your knife and swung repeatedly in his general direction, on the second or third thrust you felt it hit its intended target. But apparently this one wasn't as easy to take down as the other two, instead of recoiling from the stab he almost embraced it to get close enough to disarm you. As soon as the knife left your hand another silhouette swept your feet causing you to hit the ground hard. The pain of your face hitting the ground without any kind of brace was cut short by a sudden blunt object hitting the side of your head, knocking you out.

         You woke up strapped to a vertical metal table with a few men standing in front of you, one of them being more distinct than the others holding the device. Said man was wearing a white lab coat. He quickly noticed you were awake and gave you an evil smirk before turning to face you. After a informal greeting he began to taunt you, mocking your capabilities as a spy, seeing how easily you were caught. You kind off tuned out during most of his speech, thinking of how to escape and then take the device. You also looked around the room, it appeared to be the same one you entered earlier but now lit up.

         Besides looking a little high-tech, the room was bland with no decorations or windows. You also noticed a clock on the wall near the door, comparing it to the time you started this operation, a few hours have passed while you were unconscious. You redirected your attention back to the man in front of you, apparently he had finished his explanation and was waiting for you to zone back in so he could demonstrate what the device did. He had one of his guards bring in a dog and told you to watch. After he fiddled with the device a little he shot the dog. But contrary to your expectations, he didn't kill the dog, he somehow... shrunk it? He laughed at your reaction and said the dog was fine before shooting it again. This time the dog grew back to normal size.

         Content with his example he turned and pointed the device at you. He explained that his scientists had never actually tested it on a human before, and unfortunately, you were going to be the first test subject. Before you could even say a word you were hit by it, and your body immediately shrunk down to a few inches. He once again laughed seeing how small and pathetic you'd become, before hastily ordering his guards to apprehend you. Even though you were now free and could run the guards apprehended you with ease and quickly slammed you down on the same table you were strapped to earlier, but now it was horizontal like a normal one. The two guards held you down while the man started to talk again, saying now that it worked, he had a lot of tests and trials to put your newly sized body through.

         His sentence was interrupted by an alarm suddenly going off. He barked at one of his free guards to see what it was, before skipping the rest of his speech and pulling out a large syringe. But once again he was interrupted, this time by gunshots coming from the hallway outside the room. The man dropped the syringe and unholstered a concealed pistol while ordering one of the guards holding you to grab his rifle and kill whoever was causing all of this. But before he could even level his rifle the door burst open and some kind of really fast creature not only disarmed but knocked out everyone in the room except you and that man. The bastard only got to fire twice before he was kicked to the ground and executed by the creature.

         Now that it stood still you could make out some of its features. It looked like a female G.U.N. agent thanks to her equipment, but what stood out even more was that she looked like a white animal of sorts, possibly a bat? After she stood up you could clearly tell that she was, a well endowed one at that. She pressed against her earpiece and reported that she had found the target and requested further instruction.
