You stood in complete awe of the sight, at first believing it to be a ditch or something before you got a better view. A rush of emotions filled you as you stared. It was a giant footprint. There was no mistake. You saw another not too far from this one, and even more after that. You weren’t alone on this island, and on top of that who ever this other person was, he or she had to be gigantic. The foot prints were so huge you could lay inside them. By comparative scale, you’d probably be barely 3 inches to her... assuming you weren’t actually 3 inches. The massive plants certainly seemed to have a new meaning with this revelation. Not that the exact nature of your sizes really mattered now. At the moment, you carefully followed the tracks, curious about what exactly you were sharing the island with. The journey took almost the whole day, but you seldom found yourself standing before a huge shack fairly close to one of the beaches. Your heart pounded, but you felt it would be easy enough to inspect the building unnoticed.and made your way inside.

As the sound of waves echoed in the distance and the faint smell of sea water tickled your senses, you inspected the rooms. It wasn’t too large, but the owner clearly had some essentials like a kitchen, bathroom, and living room. You saw some junk and ship parts laying around before a noise started to echo. You quickly hid and waited... but nothing came. Soon the sound echoed once more. It... kinda sounds like... snoring? Your heart finally slowed up after the initial scare. Still maybe this would be a good time to investigate the owner to see exactly what you were dealing with. Though perhaps you tried your luck enough for one night and should keep away from her for now.
1251.title: Marine the Raccoon

12511.content: You cautiously entered what appeared to be a bedroom, careful not to disturb the owner. You slowly made your way into the center of the room so you could see whoever was on the bed better, to your surprise not only was it an anthropomorphic animal of sorts, it also had brownish-orange fur covering it's body along with dark brown fur surrounding it's eyes and ears. Besides it's intimidating size, it didn't really look that threatening, who knows, it might just be able to help you. After deciding to approach it, you climb onto the bed. You start to make your way to it's head when you notice how small it's body is, granted, it was still huge compared to yourself, but if you were at your normal height you'd probably be about 2 to 3 feet taller then the animal. Once you get closer to it's head you also noticed it had really small and hard to see clevage, well at least now you knew it was a girl. Shortly after that discovery you finally make it to her head, her hot breath almost knocked you down. What should you do now?
12511.title: The captain's quarters

choices: Mischief (she got herself a new toy or slave)
125111.content:
As the hot gusts of air rushed over your body, you quickly grabbed the bed to hold your place. The giant orange creature’s breath had a bit of that morning odor to it, but at the very least the heat was a welcome change after wandering around in the cold dark for the past couple hours. Inspecting the sleeping giant a bit more, you figured that your best hope would be to get her attention as soon as possible. Of course this was easier said than done as this, humanoid raccoon looking girl was out like a light and your size certainly wasn’t doing you any favors with waking her up.

Moving out of the way of her breath, you figured the best bet would be to head for her ear and call out for her attention. You approached slowly as the terrain sank with every step making walking a bit more difficult than normal. You used this time to inspect the room itself. Looking around this girl was clearly a fan of boats and sailing. There was a model ship on a table nearby, various maps and sea charts on the walls, and even a cute captains hat that was most likely her size. Learning a bit more about this giantess you were surprised when you realized that you had already reached the destination.

Staring at the ear laying close to the bed you decided to call out normally so not to startle her too much. “Hey! Um excuse me, please wake up?” Your tone was a bit shaken as you were unsure how to go about with this. Her ear flicked slightly, but otherwise she didn’t really seem to react. “Hey!” You call out a bit louder. Her ear twitched more but she remained out like a light. Finally you started shouting “HEY! WAKE UP!” You quickly covered your mouth afterwards but it seems that this one did the trick.

In an instant the girl jolted awake and sat up, looking around frantically. Her sudden movement and her hand planting down on the bed next to you for support caused you to tumble towards the new dip in the bed towards her orange fuzzy hand. “The heck was that?” She asked groggily in a thick Australian accent. Before long she felt something hitting her hand and shifted her focus to the strange new figure.

As her massive eyes moved closer, they were still partially shut since it was still the middle of the night, but as they got a better look at you they started to widen. As you looked back up nervously, unsure how to offer an explanation, her expression shifted once again to...
125111.title: Waking Marine Up

choices: She shrugged and goes through her punishment.
Marine is simply too curious. She asks you what are you hiding...
1251112.content:
There was no denying what emotion was being conveyed with that expression ....Anger. Well good job, you pissed off the giant. And while it was hard to tell from your diminished position, said giant appeared to be fairly young. So wonderful! You managed to piss off a giant who would totally be a paragon of emotional control and maturity.

With speeds that you wouldn’t expect from a being so large, her right hand instantly grabbed your tiny body tightly. Despite the pleasant warmth of the appendage, you began to shiver involuntarily as several frightening potential outcomes flashed in your head. Possibly having one's life at stake does that someone. You felt disoriented as the hand moved up a bit before the fingers unfurled and giving you a full frontal view of the raccoon girl's massive glaring face. Upon realizing the gravity in the situation, your face paled.

"What the hay are' you? And ya with Captian Whiskers or ya are a bot made by Egg-jerk. Send to learn secrets of the great captain Marine" The raccoon girl seriously questioned. But you give her no vocal answer as you stared incredulously at the furred titan. Just what in ever loving fuck is she talking about!?! Even Marine herself eventually realized that it was stupid and slap her forehead and shook it. "Maybe I'm a wee bit off base. But Captain Marine still make ya give your dues ya filthy little vermin." She said in her thick accent as a massive finger poked your chest roughly to stress the last few syllables.

The raccoon began to rub her chin in a multitude of ways to punish you. A suddenly a devious idea struck her not so little noggin. Instantly she pulls out her legs from the covers, revealing her very human-like pieds. With a surprisingly great amount of care, she placed you down in front of them wiggling the toes in order to intimidate her prey. You gaped at the size, for...a multitude reasons.

'Looking back on it, the shoes that are thrown around here do look..um how should I put this substantial. I mean look at them!' The bones in your legs start to feel like jelly and your face became fiery. The sight has made your groin to stir. Quickly you began to feel guilt and shame. Do this goddamned girl know what she is truly doing to you right now?

The broad light Auburn colored soles wrinkled greatly, and her ten fat toes scrunched and wiggled. Momentarily revealing her pointy nails, which is painted messily in the color daffodil.

"Yeah, Bugger take a good look at them.you going to be all up close and personal with my lovelies. And they can be quite pft...fragant!" Marine snickered impishly at the implication she gave out. One of her favorites pastimes is messing with Blaze with them. The prissy pussy cat always gagged and nagged about how "unladylike" for a young girl like herself to have feet out like that shoving em around people. Like it is better to smoother them in weird smelling gunk every day. Natural is always best according to the captain’s personal motto. And she will show the cat whose right by dealing with this little intruder!

Speaking of him he is looking at them...weirdly. She could tell it was fear. While she is very angry at the invasion of privacy and waking her up in the middle of the night. She won't do anything to truly hurt the little guy. She might be angry but she isn’t a monster. Still he needed to learn his lesson after all that. But as Marine looked back at the helpless little rat at her feet, it became increasingly obvious to the raccoon that there is something more to his expression than simple fear.

What happens next?
1251112.title: What did you think would have happen?

choices: ....giving them lots and lots of kisses and stuff."
....basking in their 'perfume'. I'm sure you love it"
12511122.content:
Marine’s eyes narrowed considerably, as she gazed down at you. The sudden silence from the titan was unnerving to you, and you weren’t entirely sure if the soft humming that soon followed was making this better or not.

"Alright, bugger spit it out. What are you hiding from your dear captain?" Marine dully ordered towards you with a slight tick of her tongue. Apparently she has already decided that you will be her cabin boy.

"What do you mean... my...c-captain?” You struggle to keep up with this girl’s decisions and intentions as she apparantly decided to ‘volunteer’ you into her crew.. “And I...I am not hiding anything from..." You squakes up to her in utter surprise, worried that the giant may have caught on to what was going on. You hoped your response would get her to move on, but Marine continued to stare down at you. It didn’t take long for you to realize that you were not that good of a liar and she could easily see through any lie you might try to throw her way. Seeing there is no way to worm out of this ordeal. "I just...I like your feet okay!" There you give her the simple pg explanation. Not the raw uncut version thank God for that.

It took a few good seconds for Marine to fully register what you just said. You were looking down in embarrassment at first, but it seemed like the worst of it was behind you... or so you thought. Once you looked back up, it appeared that your words finally clicked in Marine’s head. You shivered once more as a mischievous grin started to form on the raccoon’s lips. "Well lookee here. Bugger likes the fruits of all my hard labor." Marine teased. She further snickered at your funny red face. Upon learning this little secret of yours, your captain suddenly had a whole new slew of fun little games for the both of you in the near future. In fact she with this little revelation, Marine wasn't even mad at you anymore. Of course she was still going to "punish" you. Just for a different reason now.

"Well you show your awesome and beloved captain's footises some love and respect by...
.
12511122.title: It just got worse

choices: Marine makes you to do some pampering. You do that and more...
Marine wants to do one of those "rubs". And you are her first customer!
Marine gets playful and lifts her sole just out of reach
125111222.content:
....basking in their 'perfume'. I'm sure you love it!" Marine gushed at you. Her eyes have gotten all adorable. Seeing that genuine innocence in them (despite her apparent intentions for you) has pretty much quashed any thought of rebellion from you.

Good god, you are weak

'But It is not like I got a choice in the matter. And besides, she has to be bluffing about those big dogs of hers. This is the kind of thing that someone her age would exaggerate to brag or sound tough.' As this thought started to sink in, you felt some confidence beginning to trickle back in. Yeah, you can do this!

With a newfound sense of confidence you made your way towards the large fuzzy soles while Marine giggled overhead, finding the scenario, as well as that bold way you were stepping to be adorable. As you got closer to them. The air around you started getting warmer and staler. And your pace slowed a bit as the increasingly powerful stench was slowly making you dizzy, but nothing you can't handle...hopefully. Though your head get dizzy and your confindence started to wane, you couldn’t help but notice that your lower head is certainly enjoying this experience.

As you finally got close to the huge soles, the odor had taken a stronger grip of your mind and you found yourself beginning to enter a lucid state of euphoric arousal. Your body, once walking boldly with confidence, now wobbled like a top as you messily planted your beet red face on her harder right heel. A grand force of rotten salty cheese, spicy vinegar and wet earthiness assaulted your nostrils. The intensity and the strength of the smell slightly sting your eyes. It turns out Marine wasn’t bluffing about her ‘natural perfume’. That girl was actually telling the truth about her mighty orange soles. That smell could probably cause paint to fall off a car. Yet, despite this being the grossest thing you have ever did, a part of you is...loving the ever-loving shit of this.

As your face gets wet with sweat and wet dirt, you nostrils flared as you greedily take in the mighty odor. It was like an aphrodisiac to you, riling something deep inside of you. Clearly the soles were putting you further under their entrancing spell. A small part of you that resisted noticed that your state of mind isn't greatest right now. But for the most part, this entire experience was just too amazing for you to care.

"Wow, bugger guess you must really love em." A blushing Marine coyly chuckled as she the little human sampling them. It was such a funny feeling that the raccoon was giggling. You better believe this going to be a routine thing.

What happens next?
125111222.title: Hits like a goddamned freight train

choices: Marine asks you to clean in-between her toes.
Marine wants to create a foot sandwich.
Marine has another thing planned for you.
1251112223.content:
There was no denying that the both of you were enjoying this little activity together but it didn't take long for the raccoon to come up with a mischievously funny idea to tease you and test how far you were willing to go for her soles. Before you could work out what was happening, Marine quickly retracted her two orange soles away from your tiny form, danging them just out of reach above you.

The events that followed were predictable, to say the least. Almost immediately after you noticed, you attempted to jump as high as you could to reach her soles, or at the very least, savour in the smell of her foot sweat. You obviously couldn't jump that high, but it amused Marine enough that she found herself in a laughing fit over the results of your efforts.

It took a few seconds for her laughter to calm down but eventually it stopped. A smile was still plastered on Marine's face and mercifully, she placed her soles back towards you and stared at you with those adorable blue eyes, "Sorry matey, just wanted to have a little giggle!"

You blushed with embarrassment as the aroma of her soles returned, along with the state of ecstasy that you felt earlier that was tampering with your sense of judgement like a stimulative drug.
1251112223.title: Marine gets playful

1251114.content:
The orange, feminine creature looked down at you wearily, constantly blinking to adjust her vision. With an obvious fear in your voice, you tried calling to her again while also trying to signal her with movement. But she apparently couldn't hear you, or just didn't care enough to move in any way. Though she obviously saw you in her hand, she only stared in your general direction, not seeming to actually be thinking at all. She soon yawned and started to mutter to herself before suddenly laying back down, flipping the blanket over her, and dropping you in the process.

         Luckily you landed far enough away to not be crushed by her, and close enough to her body not to be pinned by the covers; you somehow managed to land perfectly between the two. Though you were still uncomfortably close to her, you were at least still free to move. After the initial shock, you started to look around again. You soon found out that you were underneath the covers, her body holding them up just enough to allow you to move. It was like a tent without light, and a wall of fur taking up most of it; with no exit! As you slowly realized this, you also found out exactly where you were, right beside her mid section, mere inches away from her belly button.

         Though you were relatively safe, your fear soon returned as you also realized that you could still be crushed if she rolled over. Which quickly led to you running down her side in the hopes that you could get to one of the spaces her body wouldn't be able to fully cover if she did, but still hold up the blanket a little. You started to get close to your intended destination, and made it...
1251114.title: Physically awake, but not mentally...

choices: Go under the blanket and get a better look at her body
125112.content: Though you didn't know why, you wanted to look her over more. You didn't want to push your luck and wake her up or even worse get hurt by her, but your curiosity didn't necessarily care about that. You tried to control it, but as you did it seemed not even your logic was on your side. It actually started to come up with reasons for you to investigate, one of the main ones was that you could possibly learn more about this creature and increase your chances of survival doing so. Eventually your simple curiosity turned morbid and forced you to examine her further. But you didn't know where to start, should you try getting closer to her head, over her to her back, or... Go under the covers...
125112.title: Further examination

12512.content:
Deciding to remain hidden for now, you make your way past it's bedroom. After what seemed like an hour of walking, you came across another doorway, fortunately for you it was left a crack open. Once got through it, you took a quick look around the room; judging by the counters, sink, cabinets, and the fridge you quickly came to the conclusion that this was the kitchen. As soon as you realized this you heard your stomach growl loudly and felt a wave of pain flow through your lower torso. you already knew what that meant, you either had to find something to eat or something to drink so you wouldn't digest yourself.

         You immediately spot two solutions. As you saw before, there was a sink which you assumed produced clean water. The other option was food, there was a bowl of both new and familiar looking fruit on the opposite side of the room. Thanks to the furniture mainly being made of various types of unpolished or uncarved wood, you could easily climb up and reach either one of your goals, but the question is which one?
12512.title: The kitchen

12513.content: You decided it was best to stay away from the sleeping giant for now.and try to get a feel for the house and it’s layout. Somehow, at the very second you thought that, as if some higher power had a sick, ill-timed joke prepared, you bump into one of the piles of junk that was in the middle of the room. Despite your small size, you managed to move it enough for some load bearing object on the bottom to slide out causing a large pile of boat parts to come crashing down with a series of loud bangs and thuds. When the dust cleared, you were thankfully unharmed. Most of it fell off to the side rather than towards you. However, the sound of footsteps alerted you to a new problem. The giant who lives here was now awake and comming right here to investigate the noise. As she entered the room you quickly tried to hide behind some of the debris. You peeked out to inspect the owner, surprised to see some sort of anthropomorphic animal person. She kinda looked like a raccoon with pigtails. She was wearing some green, loose fitting sleepware at the moment, long sleeve shirt and some old looking baggy pants, bare feet, and a somewhat drowsy and annoyed look on her face as she tried to figure out the source of all the noise and the mess.
12513.title: Marine’s awake now

choices: She’s cheerful, she made a new friend
She looks ticked. You’re in for it now
She’s convinced she’s dreaming and heads back to sleep
125131.content:
You ducked behind some junk and hoped to wait it out before she goes back to sleep. However, she caught a brief glimpse of something moving before you managed to hide yourself. You sat there shaking in fear as a series of slow, rhythmic thuds occurred. Each one louder and stronger than the last. Still you remained in place, trying your best not to panic.... until you saw your shelter being lifted away from you. You were now sitting in full view of the gigantic orange raccoon girl whose reaction to you seemed to be as confused as yours was to her.
“The hell?” She uttered in what sounded like an Australian accent. You tried to run but Marine didn’t even have to try to thwart that, scooping you up with the faintest of effort and inspecting her find, trying to determine that you were actually real. “I-I’m sorry for intruding... and waking you up miss. P-please don’t hurt me.” You begged as she simply stared blankly, unsure what to think of all this.
125131.title: Marine spots you

choices: She became a bit offended, but not mad
She saw it as a compliment and started to smile
1251311.content:
To your surprise her face didn't seem to be mad or "dangerously curious", instead it rather quickly turned happy. She soon greeted you; ' g'day mate, what brings ya here? '. Caught off guard by her sudden friendly attitude, you found yourself stuttering. You couldn't really make out a word before she spoke again, giving the obvious observation; ' your a small bugger ain't ya? '. Still a little scared and at a loss of words, you repeated your plea from earlier, only this time she noticed and responded; ' are ya daft? why would I hurt you? Your not that scared of lasses are ya? '.

         You eventually managed to stutter back; ' u-usually no, but your a bit... Huge for one aren't you? ', jokingly. Her expression quickly changed again to your response, she started to blush brightly on both sides of her face before...
1251311.title: A new... acquaintance

choices: "What can you do to help around here?"
12513111.content:
"Bwahahaha. I guess you're right about that, mate. I guess most lasses don't look like buildings compared to you. I'm sorry for how scary I must look to you, bloke." Marine apologizes to you.

"Th-that's okay. I know it's not exactly your fault. I'm still a bit scared, though." You stutter with a tinge of fear.

"Look, don't worry. Let's shake on it then. I promise I won't willingly hurt you." She spits into her hand and extends it to you. "Put 'er there."

You were worried about her using the word "willingly" and you really didn't want to touch a hand she spat in, but you also didn't want any toes stepped on. That could lead to you getting stepped on. Shakily, you reach out and put your arm into her palm, letting her grab it and coating your hand in her spit.

"There, we've shaken on it. Do you feel any safer around me now?" She asks.

"A little bit, yeah." You answer, nervously.

"Great, cause now that we got that settled..."
12513111.title: She started to laugh

choices: Marine takes you out and starts having her fun
Marine forgets about you and goes about her day
Marine places you in her shoe
1251314.content:
After a moment, you saw a smile form on her large face. But this smile didn’t look like the kind that was friendly or inviting. This looked like one that someone in your condition should be terrified of. Marine kept you tightly in place as she inspected you before finally comming to her decision.
“Alright, squirt. Not sure how you got here, but I think we can come to an arrangement of sorts.” She reached into the pile before pulling out a cage. Now you knew without a doubt that this was not going to go well for you. “The name’s Captain Marine and you, my little friend, are now property of me. You’ll have the honor of serving the greatest sailor who ever lived.” She dropped you into the cage and shut the entrance off. You stared up at the ceiling where the only entrance and exit was in this cage knowing escape was hopeless until she takes you back out. “But for now, it’s really late so why don’t we get some shut eye. We both have a huge day ahead of us now.”
You held onto the bars as your world shook as Marine started moving. As you entered her room you noticed it was a LOT more clean and organized than the last room. Maybe she was working on something with all that recently. With a careless thud, you were dropped onto a table by her bed as the titanic raccoon girl crawled into bed and fell asleep. You struggled to do the same thanks to the less than comfortable flooring and Marine’s snoring, but you eventually managed.

When morning came...
1251314.title: Marine’s Property

12513143.content:
Your woken up to the sounds of Marine walking around her room. Slowly your mind becomes cognizant of the world around you and you notice Marine looking at you with a smirk on her face. "Well, looks like my lazy sailor boy is a late riser, we'll have to fix that later. I don't got much use for a sleepy head, and you can't get good work done without feeling rested." She said as she opened up your cage. You considered trying to bolt while she reached in, but you didn't you'd survive a fall from the top of her table... or even get past her hand.

"M-Marine can we-"

"That's Captain to you little mate." Marine interrupted as she grabbed you and yanked you out of the cage. "And don't bother trying to talk your way out of this. You ended around my home and knocked over my stuff. If anything I'm helping you out! How could a little guy like you survive out in the cruel giant world? Having a trusty captain like me will make your tiny life a breeze! As long as you help repay the favor."

While she did kind of have a point, you really don't like the idea of owning this massive racoon girl any favors. "What exactly are you gonna have me do... captain?" You add, hoping it would please the massive girl.

It seemed to do just that as Marine had a happy smirk on her face. "Well, I'm a simple girl and I don't want a lot from ya. I mean you don't have much to give anyways." She chuckled to herself.

You were a bit offended at that comment but you decided to not push your luck.

That's when you notice that Marine was moving to the other side of her room; specifically, she was going towards the exit. Was she taking you outside? Maybe you were just going to keep watch outside? Or do some chores?

"Do you see those guys by the door?" You hear Marine ask you. You look to the door again and don't see anything of notice. All there is was the door and her shoes. You just shake your head, which Marine seems to have noticed. "Come on, you might be tiny but I'm sure your brain works just as good as mine." You just look at her slightly confused. Marine simply groans and explains it to you, "I'm talking about my shoes you barnacle brain."

Before you could process what she said, you feel your stomach drop as Marine casually tosses you towards her shoes. To her surprise, you actually sailed right into one of her shoes, landing perfectly on her heel and leaving you open to her orders. "Hmmm. It seems like you were meant to end up in there shrimp." She giggled watching you recover from your flight. She wiggled her toes eagerly as she approached you , stopping to loom above you. "Your the perfect size it looks like, now be a good sailor and make way for the captain!" She ordered as she begins to move her foot towards the opening of her shoe.

You brace for the worst as Marine's ginormous foot barrels towards you...
12513143.title: In the Captain's Treads

125131432.content:
As you watch Marine's bare foot enter from the opening, you panic and run further inside the show until you were at the very end of the insole of her shoe. Unfortunately, your decision only made things much worse, as you watched her orange toes advance further into the shoe until her toes reached the tip of the footwear. This meant that you were now stuck in an awkward position, lodged between her first and second toe. You futilely continue to struggle against the musky, sweaty, orange toes but your attempts to break free only resulted in more of her sweat splashing in your face, intensifying the smell that her foot gave off.

"Get acquainted to your new friends," you faintly heard the orange raccoon say outside of the shoe, with a hint of mischief (and sadism? you couldn't tell) in her tone. She was definitely taunting you, "Maybe they'll be friendlier to you if you cleaned 'em up a little."

As soon as she finished her sentence, her toes started wiggled back and forth, forcing your head move around the crevices of her toes, drenching you in sweat and dirt. However, you were blessed with a little luck, and nothing came into your mouth.

So what should you do now? Do you open your mouth to swallow her toe-jam and your pride? It would definitely please Marine and she'll probably be lighter on your well-being. On the other hand, maybe you should close your mouth and resist her toes getting to you? Whatever is in-between her toes won't taste good at all guaranteed unless you like feet (which you're not even sure about.)

Choices, choices, choices...
125131432.title: Time for the Captain's Foot!

choices: She looks at you with disgust (evil)
She has a big playful grin (toy/slave)
1252.content:
It’s been about a week since you found yourself in this house. Everything about the house was gargantuan; the walls, the furniture, most importantly the inhabitants. There were only two, a mature looking anthropomorphic rabbit woman, and her young daughter. The daughter also had a pet of some sort, but you haven’t seen him in a while. You doubted it was dead since the girl wasn’t mourning when it vanished, but you didn’t really care enough to figure out the real reason. You kept yourself hidden as you would spy on the two, trying to learn about them and their habits to aid in your own survival. The mother seemed polite and proper most of the time, a trait which rubbed off on her daughter, though she still had some childish traits which come with her age. You actually considered revealing yourself to one of them, seeing if thy could help you, but the fear of being mistaken for a rodent or some other pest kept that idea at bay. Unfortunately, the rabbits were very clean which made it hard to get food most of the time. The daughter would sometimes have an accident, but you you would still need to act fast to get it.

Today was not a lucky day. You haven’t eaten in a while and we’re starting to get desperate. You happened upon a mouse trap with food over the trigger as bait, staring hard at the trap pondering the risk and reward while your stomach growled. With little choice, you leaned forward and carefully tried to remove the food without setting off the trap. So far so good, but you soon lost your balance and fell forward, setting off the trap and feeling a large metal bar slam against your back painfully, holding you tightly in place. You tried to squirm free, but it was no use.you could only weakly call for help and hope whichever giant found you would be benevolent.

Footsteps soon echoed as someone entered the room to investigate. Their heavier stomps signaled that the mother had heard the noises and come to investigate. A gloved hand soon wrapped around the trap and you and lifted it up to inspect the catch. After the initial vertigo you looked at the Titan who had now removed the bar from you allowing you to move again. You would be relieved, but the thought of being in this giantess’ hand was a frightening thought, especially when you had no clue what kind of person she was. Slowly and nervously you looked up to see her expression.
1252.title: Vanilla the Rabbit

choices: She starts to treat you like her child
She starts to develop an attraction to you.
12521.content:
Your initial fears began to melt away as you saw a worried expression on the giantess’ face “Oh my. Are you okay? How did you even get like this.” You were still in a bit of shock and couldn’t really respond coherently. The mature looking rabbit woman smiled knowingly in response and started to pet you with a finger. “You poor thing. I can’t even imagine what you must be going through.” Her tone was motherly and concerned, which really did a lot to calm you down. To think, an hour ago you kept yourself hidden out of fear for your life. Now she has you and you’ve never felt safer.
“T-thank you.” You finally spoke up. “Truth is... I don’t know what happened. I just woke up one day tiny and in a strange place with no explanation... I... didn’t mean to intrude, I just really needed some form of shelter and thought you’d think i was a pest.” You timidly admitted. The massive rabbit simply hugged you to her chest as she stroked the back of your head with a finger. “Don’t you worry. "Can I hold him momma?" Cream asks with pleading eyes. You had to admit, she was a cute kid. Without consulting you or even a hint of hesitation, Vanilla grabs you off her chest.

"Of course sweetie. Be gentle with him now." She says as she carefully lowers you into her daughter's outstretched hands. You were understandably frightened at the idea of a giant child holding your tiny form, yet you were also simultaneously put at ease by her warm, curious look.

"You're so cute. Are you really my new daddy?" You nod your head in response, earning you a hug from Cream. "Oh I'm so happy. I've always wanted a dad. I promise I'll be the best daughter you could ask for." You could actually feel the diabetes build up from how much sweetness she was giving off.

You try your best to return the hug as best as your small body could. Vanilla looked over the display and cooed at how well the two of you got along so fast. "Okay sweetie, could you give him back to me? It's getting late." Cream hesitates a bit.

"Momma, is it alright if I spent the night with him? I promise I'll be good and gentle with him. Pleeease?" She gives her mother the cutest begging face she could put on.

Vanilla sighs at her daughters tactics. "Well, that's not my call to make." She turns back to you. "What do you say dear, would you like to spend the night with Cream or not?"

Despite her words you were still worried, how would she punish someone as small as you? The thoughts you had that quickly turned morbid and you naturally didn't want to get punished either. But Vanilla is your wife, she wouldn't punish you that harshly, right?

The way you saw it you had two options, you could either tell Vanilla the truth and face whatever punishment she could come up with. Or secondly, you could get Cream to quickly clean up her stuff and the two of you could pretend to be asleep until Vanilla comes in...

12533.title: Someone I missed

125333.content:
You wake up with your ears ringing in a creepily dark room. You don't remember how you got there or why you were unconscious, all you knew was that you couldn't see anything. "Specimen has finally awoken after remaining unconscious for five hours. If the rest of the species of this dimension are like him, then we will have an easy time taking over." You heard a cold voice say behind you. Instinctively, you turn to face the voice only to be baffled by the strange sight. Even though the room was dark, you could still make out a horrifyingly huge figure in the darkness!

The figure was, as far as you could tell, clad in some kind of strange suit or maybe armor. Disturbingly, it glowed a pale pink light at several key points of anatomy. Its eyes in particular glowed with a sense of condescension and hostility. "Wh-who are you!?" You shout afraid. She didn't respond, "Specimen is terrified of the appearance of our armor. There were likely be no need for use of terror tactics as a result." Against your wishes the fingers of her hands began to grasp and test your limbs, rotating them and stretching them until you groaned in pain. "Specimen appears to retain flexibility under stress and after strain. Endurance and durability will be tested at a later date." You weren't certain if she was being recorded or talking to herself, but you certainly didn't want to know how she'd test your endurance and durability later.

"Specimen also appears to adjust to new size surprisingly well. Perhaps this species could be used as miniature laborers. If that is agreed upon then I will make certain to be the first to... determine the worth of their work. This particular specimen would be quite a good trial case." She said referring to you. You could have sworn that her calculated voice became more sheepish and excited as she worked her way through that sentence. "I will be beginning the interrogation process now. However, considering the specimen's reduced stature, I might have to take a different approach." As she said these words, she removed her helmet from and revealed her face. From what you could see in the darkness, she appeared to be a salmon colored echidna with purple eyes. Gigantic purple eyes that were bearing into you with cold indifference. "Now then small one, let's begin the interrogation. Compliance will make this whole ordeal more enjoyable for both of us."
125333.title: Interrogation

1253341.content:
You wake up with a throbbing headache. You can't remember what happened that made you pass out, but you knew this was no normal nap. As you begin to stir, you start to take notice of your surroundings. You're lying on a cold metal floor. All around you are test tubes and chemicals. This must be a lab of some sort.

When you stand however, you notice just how large the room around you is. The room itself stretched on for miles. As you walk up to a beaker and are smaller than it, it finally hits you. You've shrunk. And this was no floor, it was a table.

While you were processing your thoughts, you hear the sound of a door opening. You turn around to the source of the sound and see a young, blond-haired girl walk in. She scans the room a bit before her eyes lock on you. She walks right up to where you are standing. Even with the table elevating you, you still don't even go past her stomach.

"Hey there little guy. My name's Maria. What's yours?" She spoke with such softness to her voice. You want to answer her question, but despite straining your mind, you can't remember. In fact, you can't remember much about who you are, only that you know you shouldn't be this small

"I can't remember my name."

"That's a shame. Maybe it will come to you later. For now though, welcome to the Space Colony ARK." 'Space Colony ARK'? Something about that sounded familiar.

"So, Maria, was it? Do you by any chance know how I ended up here?" You ask.

"Unfortunately I do. It's because of my grandfather."

What did Gerald do?

141.content:
It had been several days since you had woken up in a huge new world. You don't remember how you'd gotten here, you just knew that you did not like it. It was a jungle, it was hot, and everything was gigantic! It wasn't just the trees that towered over you, even the blades of grass in front of you were able to obscure your vision. You weren't sure if everything was big or if you just somehow got small but either way, your situation was bad. You had been able to scavenge food and water, but you had spent every single night out in the open. You'd gone to sleep every night afraid that something would take you away in the night, but you never had a choice and always stayed safe... somehow. But the nights had always been uncomfortable and today you were looking for shelter.

You had been wandering about for a few hours when you finally found something... terrifying. More accurately you stumbled into your best chance at finding shelter and the most terrifying thing you'd seen yet. The boot print would've probably been big to you at normal size, but now it was like a medium crater. All of the crushed grass and rubble made it clear, whatever had made that print would crush you with no effort. Although terrifying, this was still good news for you. If something this big was stalking the area, that probably meant that it had a home somewhere. You knew it was a risk, but decided it would be worth it to look for whatever shelter that thing had. To that end, you followed the trail of boot prints, continually unnerved by the devastation they left in their wake. You found the remains of an insect in one of them and suddenly felt a lot more pleased about how well he'd done in this new place all things considered.

After following the trail for hours, you found what you were looking for. The prints had lead you straight to a hole in the ground, one that seemed to lead pretty deep below the earth. The tracks you had been following stopped in front of the burrow and immediately circled around back the way you came. You assumed the tracks had belonged to a local of the area, one who had tracked down whatever animal owned this burrow and killed it. You decided that if you ever found the person that did this, you'd try to speak to them and thank them for this gift. Part of your mind doubted that the whole situation was as safe as you thought, but the rest of your mind scolded that as ridiculous. No animals wore boots, and even if the owner of the burrow was still alive, it had likely been chased away by the person that could tear the earth apart simply by walking. Without hesitation you made your way down into the burrow, eager to look into your new home.

Your findings were almost as strange as the new world you were in. You hadn't expected to find much, but instead you found a surprisingly big space. There was a bed in one corner of the room and the other corners were filled with large piles of junk and scrap. It almost seemed like the area was being inhabited by something sentient rather than the instinct-driven animals that usually lived in them. As that thought makes its way through your head, you begin to feel something. At first it felt like a very subtle tremor, very weak but completely noticeable. A strange gust of wind followed this, a hot wind that was rhythmic and not very pleasant smelling. Unable to ignore it you turn around and immediately regret your decision.

Crouching in front of you was some strange anthropomorphic creature and you had a hunch that it was female judging by the sound of its breathing, which explains the hot air you had been feeling. She had orange fur that was tied up as long thick hair on the back of her head, kept in two locks with auburn strings. There were two brown stripes across each of her eyes and she had bushy round ears that reach the end of her hair. Her peach muzzle and small black nose were uncomfortably close to you, threatening to consume you in the blink of an eye. Meanwhile her blue eyes were locked onto you and you could see her bushy tail stuck up in the air behind her. Further behind her you saw what you dreaded most; two boots, one with a fur trim and the other with some metal bands on it. She WAS the one who left the tracks to the burrow! She had figured out you were following her and had circled around behind you without you noticing. And now you were in her sights and she...
141.title: Sticks the Badger

“The perfect home for my new pet.”
“You weren’t going to fool me with that flimsy story, SPY!”
1411.content:
You stood absolutely still, frozen with fear. You continued to stare into her eyes unable to look away, the animosity you could see within them filled you with even more dread. You continued to stare at her without moving, until she finally spoke with a high and energetic voice; âHeya little fella, what brings ya around here?â You became even more shocked realising this thing could speak, but soon your panic started to drift away as this revelation sunk in. You almost immediately responded with what little you knew about your current situation, and why you came inside what you now presumed was her burrow. She seemed to understand your words and gestures, but still remained silent and motionless throughout your explanation. The whole time, this animal person seemed to be giving you an odd stare. You couldnât quite tell if it was good, bad, or simple uncertainty from her, but it was still unnerving regardless.

         Soon after you finished your explanation the massive orange creature picked you up. Her grip was a bit rougher than you would have liked, but at least it wasnât hard enough to break anything. She soon deposited you onto a crudely made table. Before you could ask her what was going on she ran off without saying a word. The strange giant darted across the massive room over to a pile a metallic junk and started to sift through it. Still being in a state of confusion and slight fear, you stared at her as she started picking up small chunks of metal with both curiosity and apprehension, not knowing what she was going to do with you or those pieces of dense rock. After awhile you lost interest and started to look around the den, besides the things you already saw on your way in, there really wasn't anything intriguing about it. It was mostly just dirt as you suspected, the only other noticeable feature was another hole seeming to lead deeper down into the ground.

         Soon after you discovered the hole, you felt the familiar tremor of her boots hitting the floor coming in your direction once again. Before you could turn back enough to face her, you heard a loud metallic thud echo from all around you that was immediately followed by a small vibration. You soon realised you were trapped within a crudely made metal cage, if you could even call it that. You then finally heard the giant speak again;

As the gigantic badger removed her ratty boot, you were hit by both an overwealmingly powerful odor and an equally strong sense of dread. She obviously had a very active lifestyle and clearly didn’t spend a lot of time washing or replacing her clothes. You swear you couldn’t see an inch of the boot that wasn’t coated in a layer of dirt or mud. Sticks stamped her foot down inches from you. She didn’t want to kill you (yet), just give you a good scare before moving on to the main event. “W-Wait. I’m not actually with the government. I just said tha-“ Sticks suddenly grabbed you tightly, squeezing the air out of you and silencing you rather effectively. “Right now, I don’t care if you’re with the government, the robot uprising, the post office, the Girl Scouts, or one of the 5 boy bands the Illuminati use to broadcast mind control sound frequencies. You and whoever you’re affiliated will learn not to mess with Sticks the Badger.” She held you over the discarded boot as she glanced back at your terrified face. “Assuming you survive long enough to relay this message to them.”

You were never so terrified in your life. Her tight grip prevented any struggles from you. In retrospect, it was an extremely stupid idea to lie to the giant, paranoid conspiracy theorist that you were a government spy. You soon hit the insole of the boot with a hard landing. You could finally breathe again, but the air you were provided with was foul and tainted by the boot’s odor. Looking up you saw her bare foot lowering. Time seemed to slow as you watched this descent. You weren’t sure if it was perception or if Sticks was intentionally doing this slowly to taunt you. Finally her toes entered and quickly ran you down like a bulldozer. You soon found yourself trapped under the... admittedly fairly soft, sole of the giantess as she stood up, putting a tremendous amount of weight and pressure on you. Outside, Sticks was ecstatic. She wasn’t sure what this tiny guy was with, but it had to be something bad. Who else sends in tiny people? No matter, she found him, and she plans to use him to send a message to whoever might be spying on her. On top of that, it felt amazing to finally put these people in their place. It certainly helped that you felt great to her underneath her foot. She gave a few squeezes with her toes as she cracked a small grin. Inside, you were in a living hell. You wanted to pass out from this so you could have SOME sort of escape from your torture, but your fate wasn’t so lucky. You didn’t know how much more of this you could take

"No more nap time, it's time to start to start a new day." you said to yourself as you got up and rubbed your eyes. "Good morning worl....huh?!" you got confused after you finally opened your eyes and see your current location.

Everything around you was full of the most tallest and strangest trees you ever seen. "They look more like tall flowers and....wait a minute, something's not right!" you thought to yourself. You made up some crazy theory that you are in the middle of a strange alien world or something but the question is: how did you got here? Did the aliens adducted you or something? or was this another surreal dream you're having?

You climbed up one of the flowers to get a more detailed look on were you are. Standing on top of it (thank god you're not allergic to pollen), you look at your brand-new surroundings. You were amazed at where you are; you are in the middle of a vast meadow that stretched for miles. "Wow and I thought this world was already huge..." you said. Suddenly, you saw what looked like buildings not too far but too close either. "Maybe I could get some help over there, but it does look like it could take hours to get there." you said disappointed "But I can't stay here much longer who knows what kind of danger lurks around this place."

Just then....
145331.title: In the vast fields

choices: Yes, the alien is somewhere nearby
Yes, but the alien is already standing over you
No, you go the city to find one
1453311.content:
Staying here won't do any good so it's better to at least seek some help in the city despite being far away. "It's a long road ahead, but it'll probably be worth it." You said and immediately make a huge dash towards civilization.

As you make the effort to run as fast as you can, you could slowly make out the city. The structures all looked highly advanced, making it look futuristic. There's not much to say here other than the fact that it looks like something from sci-fi media, maybe you really are in an alien world after all.

After a few minutes of running (and some bit stopping to catch your breath), you're now near the city's outskirts. Unfortunately, you immediately collapse to the ground, panting after all that running. You know that you need to at least find someone there for help but then again if it's true that you are in an alien world, perhaps it would be best to find at least one inhabitant in order to know what they look like and if they are friendly or not.

You stand up and look around; there's gotta someone around here. Maybe you could get that alien's attention while you can.

Do you find one?
1453311.title: Extraterrestrial City

choices: You try to get her attention!
1453312.content:
You turned around to see...a giant weird green plant like creature. And judging by the way the creature looks,you say it's a female.

You made a slight blush when she begin she sniff the flowers and taking in the scenery. She just look so adorable.

What happens next?
1453312.title: A flower smelling a flower

choices: A little teasing doesn't hurt anyone.
No,it's wrong to messed with people like that.
14533121.content:
Despite the young alien seemingly zone out at the scenery. She quite easily saw your tiny body apporaching her.

"Oh, hello." Cosmo softly said with grace. The tone made you paused and weirdly flustered."Hmmm... you look quite different from other creatures. That is, in regards to your...um... well your stature".

"Well I just... kinda appeared here out of nowhere." You said to the towering seedrian. "Oh, you poor thing!” Cosmo saint in a concerned tone that made you feel much safer already. “Well don't you worry I'll take care of you for the time being." The kind alien reassures the shrunken human. "And my name is Cosmo by the way."

You gratefully nodded to her. And with that she turned her back to you. She appear looking for her house or something? But you notice her bare leg peeking out of her petal like skirt. They were surprisely long and curvy compared to what you would expect from her. And her emerald colored flats are being played with her light green tinted foot. You begin to get closer to it. You notice the alien's feet is very much like a human’s. It's was significantly longer, wider, and thicker than a human's feet, but the size difference wasn't that crazy.

You got even closer to heel part of the flat. You look back at Cosmo, she still hasn't noticed what you're doing. "One sniff wouldn't hurt..." You slowly thought as you started to sniff the heel part of the shoe. Your head recoiled back once you smelt the complex and strong scent. It is a perfect blend of a primal earthness and fruitiness, and the prutid funk of sour cheesy vingear.

You shake your blushing head, and look up.. only to see the seemingly unaware seedrian's frim and perky bottom that's well hidden because of the skirt.

"Stop being a creepy prev!" You mentally chided yourself as you quickly look in other direction. But unknown to you, Cosmo has been aware of the human..."looking" at her the whole time. She had a small smile. Maybe she can some fun,but then again... it's not nice to mess with people like that.

What does the Seedrian do?
14533121.title: Such a Lovely Plant.

choices: A just simple foot rub. No need to it that far.
Cosmo wants something more than a mere rub.
145331211.content:
'A little fun doesn't hurt anyone..' Cosmo thought with good natured mischief. She sat down on the grassy ground,and startling the poor shrunken boy.

Cosmo faked a tired sigh that sounded so adorable to her new companion. She crossed her tired feet,and began to dangling her flats.

"Little one...can you do something for me." Cosmo lightly moaned to him which he looked at her with great concern.

Gosh-darn, she was a good actor

"Yes sure... what do you need." The boy said with worry...as he tries not to glance at..."those"

"Can you tend to my feet. They are quite sore..today" Cosmo said with a hurt grimace. While snickering internally at his red face.

You.. quite unthinkingly nodded to her. As she giggled sweetly at him.

"Thank you for much little one. I will never forget this." Cosmo gratefully said as she slowly took off her flats.

What does Cosmo want him to do?
145331211.title: Such a pretty flower!

choices: Cosmo wants him to stop. And she pins him with her foot to do so.
Our boy goes all in. Cosmo is in for quite a ride.
1453312111.content:
"Can you um..can you.." The alien face is positively inflamed with slight guilt and embarrassment. As she attempts to squeak out her commandant to the boy. She can't help but feel a bit…icky for manipulating this creature's desire for her own benefit and relaxation. Her five surprisedly humanish toes scrunched and the sizable extraterrestrial soles made little wrinkles. "....rub my feet. But I understand you don't wan-Eep!"

The poor girl couldn't even finish her sentence as little supple hands tenderly pounded on her succulent flesh. Her mouth began to waver as his fingers poke at her midstep. This was a bad idea…sure it is weirdly relaxing….but a bad idea nonetheless. She made a weird sucking noises as she fights the urge to laugh

The boy was, on the other hand, was in heaven. The feel of skin was like a somewhat hardened pillow. And he got a much stronger sampling of her "perfume". He can feel his young crotch tighten with every tainted breath he takes. An urge to something do morea then just generic rubbing blossomed.

Simultaneously two blushes appeared, one was powered by innocence and flustered feelings, while the later was a symbol of teenage puberty and arousal. It was clear that one of them is going to " burst before the other one.

But the question is…which one?
1453312111.title: Goddamn, I love botany.

choices: Yes! Omelette needs to be canon!
145332.content: How about Omelette? Eggman's adorable niece. (I know she's a fan character but she SHOULD be canon. You know she should be.)
145332.title: Omelette Robotnik

1453322.content: Topaz- The special forces woman from Sonic X that teams with Rouge?
1453322.title: no

14533222.content: What about Sonya from sonic underground?
14533222.title: Another choice

choices: No, she's only a little shorter anyways.
145332222.content:
How about Jewel the Beetle? Tangle's friend from her home town!

Don't you want to be smaller than a bug?
145332222.title: Jewel the Beetle

1453322221.content:
You still can't believe the situation you were in, convinced that it was all a dream. You had woken up this morning, very clearly not inside of your bed. You appeared to be inside some sort of museum that housed a lot of valuable minerals. That alone would have been strange enough, but there was also the fact that you were now ridiculously tiny as well! Even the smallest minerals in the museum were massive boulders to you! Fortunately no one had been in the museum when you first woke up, otherwise you probably never would have woken up.

But the weirdness of the situation didn't end there. Taking advantage of the emptiness, you started looking around the museum for some of the staff. It was hard to tell at your size, but the place didn't seem that big. You reasoned that it was a small museum. Which was fine for you, that means you had less ground to cover. As you wandered around though, it was clear that no one was out in the main area. You even stumbled upon the main entrance and tried to squeeze under it to no avail. Even your miniscule size wasn't enough to get under its extra tiny gap. Hanging on the handle, you saw a sign that said open on it. Since the open side was facing you inside the museum, you figured the closed side was facing the outside. Which meant the museum was closed.

"That explains the lack of people." You mumble to yourself as you turn back.

Even though the museum was closed, you decided to keep looking for help. Surely there had to be someone in the museum who could help you. A security guard or the owner had to be in here. You didn't know how long the museum would be closed and you wanted any kind of help ASAP. Knowing that the common area would be devoid of people, you start looking for side doors. After a while of searching you eventually found a door that said curator on it. Fortunately, this door had a big enough gap for you to squeeze under. The thing you saw when you got on the other side was the weirdest thing yet!

Inside the room there was someone sitting at a desk. But that someone wasn't a human! It was some kind of gigantic colorful insect! One that was wearing clothes! At first you swore that you had gone crazy, but no matter what you did you still saw a giant beetle sitting at a desk! Something about her looked vaguely familiar, but you didn't understand what that was until you thought a bit. Eventually it hit you that she looked just like a character from Sonic the Hedgehog! So apparently you were shrunk, trapped in a different dimension, and your only help was from a character you didn't recognize. You guessed that she was from the comics, but you had never kept up with those so you didn't know who she was. You could tell that she was a female beetle at least but that was it. No matter how strange it was, you had decided to approach the giant beetle.

And now you were at the foot of her desk, right by her feet as she worked. You still don't want to believe your situation but you had no choice at this point. In your new spot you finally noticed some details about your potential savior. She was definitely a beetle, well a Sonic beetle, but a beetle none the less. She seemed to have primarily light blue skin. Her exoskeleton was an even lighter blue with pink, yellow, green, and blue highlights that gave it a rainbow like shimmer. Honestly her exoskeleton looked like it could be one of the minerals in her museum. Her two antennae were light blue like her skin and strangely cute with their small size; still bigger than you unfortunately. Even though they were just barely showing right now, the interior of her wings seemed to be cream colored. Finally, she had pink eyes and a white muzzle.

She was dressed how you would expect a professional person would, but it seemed strange on her beetle form. She was wearing a pink jacket with a matching pink miniskirt that didn't go past her knees. She was sitting at her desk now though, so it might go further down when she was standing. On her hands she wore white gloves with navy cufflinks, probably for when she handled any files or sensitive materials. Of course all sonic characters wore gloves anyways so it figured she had them. To your surprise, she had some navy stockings on and pink heels that matched her dress. Her heels were currently discarded a few inches away from you, leaving her feet free to hang above you. It was weird to see a Sonic character without their shoes on. Apparently they just had normal, somewhat cartoony, feet.

The beetles foot hung above you precariously. You don't know if it was the stress of the situation or something else but her feet seemed odd to you. Their movements felt like they were taunting you. The scrunching of her toes, the way she flexed her soles, or whenever she scratched one foot with the other, it felt like a taunt. You were smaller than the foot of a bug girl and they could come down and crush you at any time. The movements of her feet seemed to purposefully emphasize that. Shaking those thoughts out of your head you back up to make some space, and end up near her discarded heels.

Looking behind you, you see that you are at the entrance of one of her heels. Looking inside you could see that the heels were somewhat worn but still a little fresh. If you wanted to, you could go inside and rest. The beetle seemed plenty busy, so you could probably get a quick rest before she leaves...

Once again you shake your head. "What's gotten into me? I must be really tired." You groan as you get ready to make your next move. Taking a deep breath you decide to...
1453322221.title: At the Feet of a Beetle

info.brief_description: Wake up tiny around the cast of the Sonic games
info.description:
Much like the title implies, you find yourself shrunken around the cast of the long running Sonic the Hedgehog franchise.
Pick any character you like and go crazy.

Rules:
Please refrain from killing off the main character or abruptly ending the story in some other way. You can end a story, but do try to give it a decent conclusion.
Please refrain from assigning them a name or age.
Also try to keep them somewhere between 2 and 6 inches tall.
Other than that, most things are fair game. Feel free to message me if youâre unsure about something.

To help the story grow, a bonus of 2000 to 2500 GP is awarded for every chapter added to the characters listed below (not including one sentence choice chapters or anything similar to that. You need to put some effort in)

Bonus Characters: Rouge the Bat, Sticks the Badger, Tangle the Lemur, Jewel the Beatle, Marine the Raccoon, Bunnie Rabbot, and any male character.
Additional Monthly Bonus (Dec-Jan): Vanilla the Rabbit
